original_text: Eat the Feast of Flat Bread every year. For seven days, you must eat bread that you have made without any yeast. I have commanded you to do this. Do it at the right time during the month Abib. It was in that month that you came out of Egypt. Nobody must come to me without an offering.
korean_text: 너는 무교병의 절기를 지키라 내가 네게 명령한 대로 아빕월의 정한 때에 이레 동안 무교병을 먹을지니 이는 그 달에 네가 애굽에서 나왔음이라 빈 손으로 내 앞에 나오지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: Eat the Feast of Flat Bread every year
you must eat bread that you have made without any yeast
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 누룩 없이 만든 떡을 먹어야 한다

sentences.original_text: I have commanded you to do this
Do it at the right time during the month Abib
It was in that month that you came out of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 애굽에서 나온 것이 바로 그 달이다

sentences.original_text: Nobody must come to me without an offering
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 예물 없이 내게 오지 못한다
